cutter.http

Class PostRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • cutter.http.Request
      • cutter.http.PostRequest

  • public class PostRequest
extends Request
    This class makes it easy to send POST-requests to a server it extends from the Request class
    Author:
    Phil Niehus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void request()
      This method executes the POST-request and saves the servers answer

    • Constructor Detail

      • PostRequest

        public PostRequest(java.lang.String url,
                   java.lang.String[] params,
                   java.lang.String[] values,
                   java.lang.String mimetype)
        Parameters:
        url - A String that contains the target-url
        params - A String[] containing the names of the parameters
        values - A String[] that contains for the parameters (has to be in the same order like params)
        mimetype - A String containing the MIME-type for the post-request, default is like an html-form and can be used with php

      • PostRequest

        public PostRequest(java.lang.String url,
                   java.lang.String[] params,
                   java.lang.String[] values)
        Parameters:
        url - A String that contains the target-url
        params - A String[] containing the names of the parameters
        values - A String[] that contains for the parameters (has to be in the same order like params)
